original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-08 15:58:08' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND u.Reputation>=1
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-08 15:58:08'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.ViewCount >= 0
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3E4.Id=E2.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E3E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E3E4E2.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E2E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E3E4E2E5.Id)
